mdRecord.dcterms:title: Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia Lays a Wreath at Washington's Tomb, January 14, 1947
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rowe, Abbie, 1905-1967
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographic print of the Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia and member of his party at the tomb at Mount Vernon. The Crown Prince lays a wreath on Washington's sarcophagus. The photograph is adhered to card stock with a printed caption below: Assisted by his Excellency Fuad Bey Hamza, His Royal Highness lays a wreath upon the tomb of George Washington.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
Washington, George, 1732-1799 -- Tomb
